title: Ecosystem 1
brief_description: SUMMARY: Based upon a home experiment kit for students, which deals quantitatively with the interaction of populations of the alga Chlorella and the water flea Daphnia. Dick Morris first sets up the differential equation describing the Chlorella populatio
